import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../../style/logo.png"; import vinho from "../../style/vinho.jpg" import login from "../../style/login-icon.png"; import produtos from "../../dados/produtos.json"; export default function Home() { const [products, setProducts] = React.useState([]); const [currentsProduct, setCurrentUser] = React.useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); React.useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/products/all") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(data)); }, []); const handleClick = (event) => { navigate(`/Description/${event.currentTarget.id}`) }; const handleLoad = (event) => { console.log("funci"); }; return (
